title: How to Watch Newsmax+ on your Samsung TV

steps.title: Open Apps and select the icon.
steps.content: Open Apps and select the icon. Scroll down to see the apps available to you, then select the magnifying glass icon to search for the Newsmax+ app. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Type Newsmax and select to install the app.
steps.content: Type Newsmax and select to install the app. Once you've installed it, you will find the Newsmax app on your Samsung TV's home screen. You will need a Newsmax Plus subscription to start watching. If you don't have one, go to this link to sign up for a free trial.

steps.title: Open Newsmax and sign in.
steps.content: Open Newsmax and sign in. If you already have a Newsmax Plus account or just signed up for the trial, you'll need to log in before you can use the app to watch anything. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Newsmax app on your phone or tablet.
steps.content: Open the Newsmax app on your phone or tablet. If you can't find the Newsmax app on your Samsung TV, you can download it on your Android, iPhone, or iPad, and mirror it to your Samsung TV's screen. It's free to download the Newsmax app from the Google Play Store and App Store. Tizen OS ships with all Samsung TVs since later 2015 models, so you'll only need to cast from your phone or tablet if you have an older TV. [3] X Research source The first time you open the Newsmax app, you'll be asked to sign in with your Newsmax Plus subscription.

steps.title: Mirror your phone or tablet's screen to your Samsung TV.
steps.content: Mirror your phone or tablet's screen to your Samsung TV. Once you have the app open and are watching a show, you can mirror your screen to your TV to watch Newsmax on the big screen. iPhone/iPad: Swipe down from the top-right corner of the Home screen, tap the Screen Mirroring option, and select your Samsung TV. Android: , swipe down from the top of the home screen to open your quick settings, then tap Smart View , Screen Mirroring , or similar.
